name: Status
description:
A dangerous and UNSTABLE machine has recently malfuntioned! It's up to you to solve Warioware style minigames to stop the machine from exploding!

Controls (these are the list of all the controls that COULD be used, for each minigame, you have to figure out what controls to use)

  • Mouse
  • Arrow keys 
  • No touch or WASD support yet

Credits:

Code and Art: Cloud Studios

Music: Fire Level by Spring Spring on opengameart
